name: Small Tank
description:
This is a classic retro 2.5D tank battle game. Familiar gameplay and simple operations allow players to control their tanks and engage in shooting battles with other tanks in the game, requiring them to be completely eliminated. Of course, when eliminating enemy tanks, it is also important to protect oneself. Once the player's tank is defeated, it will end. Classic retro tank game, come and experience a childhood revisit!

Game highlights


The game operation is simple, and the gameplay content is very classic, providing players with a comfortable gaming process.


A unique gameplay mechanism that provides players with a rich gaming experience while unleashing exciting combat mechanics.


These battles are very exciting when they occur on the game screen, bringing players more exciting moments.


You need to flexibly manipulate your tanks to participate in hot blooded battles.
